channel.title: Impassable piston sequence on Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c) [Fixed]
channel.description:
A little while ago I posted a Help & Support thread about being unable to get past the second set of pistons in Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c...right before the part when you hop down from one conveyor belt to another). Tried DOZENS of times but was getting insta-killed even after visually clearing the last piston (and definitely NOT actually getting crushed by it).
However, loading to an autosave a minute before this (right before opening the hatch to this area) seems to have fixed it; I got through the pistons effortlessly on my first try. Looks like this could be a small bug.
What I also noticed is that the time I got stuck, the second two pistons in this set were moving together at the exact same height, instead of there being a slight difference. No idea if that is related.
Picture: [url]https://i.imgur.com/7S3KI.jpg[/url]
getpos: setpos -1005.715454 764.535950 583.531250;setang 9.129639 0.730591 0.000000

item.title: Impassable piston sequence on Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c) [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: robot_deodorant
item.description:
Make sure you are sprinting.

Read full topic

item.title: Impassable piston sequence on Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c) [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: evilspleen1213
item.description:
Cool, glad to know I’m not the only one who experienced this. Not a major bug I suppose, but hopefully it will be addressed.

Read full topic
item.source: Impassable piston sequence on Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c) [Fixed]

item.title: Impassable piston sequence on Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c) [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: BillTheCat
item.description:
I too had the same problem. The first and second pistons were moving almost exactly in synch and it was impossible to get through the sequence. After trying for 2 hours I reloaded from the auto save and the pistons were staggered.

Read full topic
item.source: Impassable piston sequence on Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c) [Fixed]

item.title: Impassable piston sequence on Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c) [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: JohnDay
item.description:
I had the exact same issue as well. Did the same thing as you and restarted an earlier save, and got through with ease.

Read full topic
item.source: Impassable piston sequence on Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c) [Fixed]

item.title: Impassable piston sequence on Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c) [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: evilspleen1213
item.description:
DaftMink:

It’s not impassible, just hard.
Run into the first one so it blocks your path, then keep running.

That’s exactly what I did…must have tried nearly fifty times. Tried sprinting the whole way, sprinting half way, all different kinds of timing, and even after visually clearing it I was still dropping dead (and sometimes going flying). Half the time the last piston was still all the way up.

After going back to the autosave I practically did it with my eyes closed, and the timings on the pistons looked completely different.

Read full topic
item.source: Impassable piston sequence on Residue Processing (bm_c2a4c) [Fixed]
